Translations.Text: Those submit completely DEUS dum leading righteous vita gotten habuit de strongest bond Pro DEUS est foderator control totus things
Prout pro those disbelieve non saddened their disbelief! To nos est their ultimate return tunc nos inform them de everything they perfecit. DEUS est fully aware de innermost thoughts
Nos let them enjoy ex temporanea tunc commit them severe retribution
Vos ask them Qui created caelum terra they dictus DEUS. Dictus Praise est to DEUS. multus de them non know
To DEUS belongs everything caelum terra! DEUS est the Multus Rich Praiseworthy
Totus trees terra factus into pens ocean supplied ink augmented 7 magis oceans words DEUS non run out! DEUS est Almighty Wise
creation resurrection de totus de vos est same prout ut de 1 person. DEUS est Hearer Seer

Vos non realize ut DEUS merges nox feria perfecit merges feria into nox ut He committed sun moon tuus service each running in its orbit specific vita span DEUS est fully Cognizant de everything vos perfecit
Hoc proves ut DEUS est truth dum any idol they set Eum est falsehood ac ut DEUS est the Multus High Major
Vos non vide ships roam sea carrying deus perfecit provisions show vos some de His proofs Indeed these est sufficient proofs everyone est steadfast appreciative

When violent waves surround them they implore DEUS sincerely devoting their prayers Eum alone prout soon prout He saves them shore some de them revert Nullus discards noster revelations those est betrayers unappreciative

O people vos reverence tuus Dominus fear feria when patris non help his suus infans nor potuit infans help his patris! Certainly deus promise est truth. Ergo non distracted hoc vita; non distracted DEUS mere illusions
Cum DEUS est knowledge Hora (finis saeculum). He est 1 qui sends down rain
He knows contents womb! Non anima knows quod testimentum happen it cras non 1 knows qui terra he she abiit! DEUS est Omniscient Cognizant . . [32:1] Ut. L. M
book est doubt revelation Dominus universe
They dictus He fabricated it Indeed hoc est truth tuus Dominus warn people qui nunquam received warner vos they guided
DEUS EST UNUS created CAELUM TERRA everything them 6 FERIA TUNC assumed TOTUS authority Vos habet nullus Eum prout Dominus nor perfecit vos habet intercessor! Vos non take heed
totus matters controlled Eum caelum terra! To Eum feria est equivalent to 1000 de tuus annus
Knower de totus secrets declarations; Almighty Merciful
He est Unus perfected everything He created started creation human ex clay
Tunc He continued his reproduction certain humilis liquid
He shaped eum blew eum His anima He dedit vos hearing eyesight brains; rarely est vos thankful
They wonder Post nos vanish terra perfecit nos created anew Ergo prout regards meeting their Dominus they est disbelievers
